description: Try our easy to follow Brazilian-Style Chicken & Coconut Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curry,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato,Chicken,Spinach,Dairy free
name: Brazilian-Style Chicken & Coconut Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g chicken thigh fillets, cut into strips
2 cups medium grain white rice, steamed (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add ginger, garlic and onion, cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until softened. Add chicken and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Add spices and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Meanwhile, combine 1/2 cup water, coconut milk and peanut butter in a jug. Add to pan and bring to a simmer. Cook, uncovered, for 7 minutes. Add tomatoes and cook for a further 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Stir in spinach and lime juice. Cook for 1 minute or until spinach is wilted. Serve curry over rice and top with coriander sprigs.
